title: Countries with the lowest fertility rate globally 2050 to 2055
yAxis: Average number of children per woman
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average number of children per woman in each Country on the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
There is a difference of 0.21 between the maximum Country Brunei Darussalam and minimum Country Singapore.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average number of children per woman in the y axis.
The maximum Average number of children per woman 1.59 is found at Country Brunei Darussalam and the minimum is found at Singapore where Country is 1.38.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average number of children per woman in each Country on the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
There is a difference of 0.21 between the maximum Country Brunei Darussalam and minimum Country Singapore.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average number of children per woman in each Country on the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
Second maximum Average number of children per woman is found at Country Canada.
There is a difference of 0.21 between the maximum Country Brunei Darussalam and minimum Country Singapore.
The Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman, followed by Canada, and Canada. Down to the Country Singapore which is the lowest.
Country Brunei Darussalam, Portugal, Spain, and Canada have the same Average number of children per woman.
The highest value 1.59 at Brunei Darussalam is almost 1.04 times larger than the average value 1.53.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 38.19.
